text: Daniele Penzavalli (born 8 November 1968) is a retired Swiss football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Lugano players Category:AC Bellinzona players Category:FC Locarno players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Switzerland under-21 international footballers
title: Daniele Penzavalli
